languages.text: "Мы с пристрастием допросили всех задержанных, известных буйным нравом, сравнили изъятые инструменты и оружие с ранами на трупе, но так и не смогли установить, кто повинен в изуродовании трупа. Ответственность за это беру на себя".

"We have thoroughly questioned all detainees known to have a violent temper and compared the tools and weapons we seized with the wounds found on the corpse, but have not been able to establish who was responsible for the mutilation. I take full responsibility for this failure."
languages.original_text: "Мы с пристрастием допросили всех задержанных, известных буйным нравом, сравнили изъятые инструменты и оружие с ранами на трупе, но так и не смогли установить, кто повинен в изуродовании трупа. Ответственность за это беру на себя".

traits.locale_text: "We have rigorously questioned all the detainees known for their violent temper and compared the tools and weapons seised with the wounds on the corpse, but have not been able to establish who was responsible for the mutilation. I take full responsibility for this failure."

languages.text: "Wir haben alle für ihr gewalttätiges Wesen bekannten Häftlinge eingehend befragt und die sichergestellten Werkzeuge und Waffen mit den Wunden der Leiche verglichen, konnten aber nicht ermitteln, wer für die Verstümmelung verantwortlich war. Ich übernehme für diesen Misserfolg die volle Verantwortung."
languages.original_text: "We have thoroughly questioned all detainees known to have a violent temper and compared the tools and weapons we seized with the wounds found on the corpse, but have not been able to establish who was responsible for the mutilation. I take full responsibility for this failure."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben alle für ihr gewalttätiges Wesen bekannten Häftlinge eingehend befragt und die sichergestellten Werkzeuge und Waffen mit den Wunden der Leiche verglichen, konnten aber nicht ermitteln, wer für die Verstümmelung verantwortlich war. Ich übernehme für diesen Misserfolg die volle Verantwortung."

languages.text: « Nous avons interrogé tous les détenus connus pour leur tempérament violent et avons comparé les outils et armes saisis avec les marques sur le cadavre, mais nous n'avons pas pu déterminer qui était responsable de la mutilation. J'assume l'entière responsabilité de cet échec. »
languages.original_text: "We have thoroughly questioned all detainees known to have a violent temper and compared the tools and weapons we seized with the wounds found on the corpse, but have not been able to establish who was responsible for the mutilation. I take full responsibility for this failure."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons interrogé tous les détenus connus pour leur tempérament violent et avons comparé les outils et armes saisis avec les marques sur le cadavre, mais nous n'avons pas pu déterminer qui était responsable de la mutilation. J'assume l'entière responsabilité de cet échec. »

languages.text: «Hemos interrogado concienzudamente a todos los detenidos conocidos por su temperamento violento y hemos cotejado las herramientas y armas incautadas con las heridas del cadáver, pero no se ha podido identificar al responsable de la mutilación. Asumo toda la responsabilidad por este fracaso».
languages.original_text: "We have thoroughly questioned all detainees known to have a violent temper and compared the tools and weapons we seized with the wounds found on the corpse, but have not been able to establish who was responsible for the mutilation. I take full responsibility for this failure."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos interrogado concienzudamente a todos los detenidos conocidos por su temperamento violento y hemos cotejado las herramientas y armas incautadas con las heridas del cadáver, pero no se ha podido identificar al responsable de la mutilación. Asumo toda la responsabilidad por este fracaso».

languages.text: 「暴力的な気性の持ち主であることが知られている拘禁者全員を徹底的に尋問し、応酬した道具や武器と死体についていた傷を比較しましたが、死体を切断した実行犯を特定することはできませんでした。この失敗の全責任は私にあります」
languages.original_text: "We have thoroughly questioned all detainees known to have a violent temper and compared the tools and weapons we seized with the wounds found on the corpse, but have not been able to establish who was responsible for the mutilation. I take full responsibility for this failure."

traits.locale_text: 「暴力的な気性の持ち主であることが知られている拘禁者全員を徹底的に尋問し、応酬した道具や武器と死体についていた傷を比較しましたが、死体を切断した実行犯を特定することはできませんでした。この失敗の全責任は私にあります」

languages.text: “我们审讯了所有有暴力倾向的囚犯，还将我们缴获的武器与工具与尸体的伤口进行了比对，但我们未能查明究竟是谁残害了那具尸体。我对这样的失败负有全部责任。”
languages.original_text: "We have thoroughly questioned all detainees known to have a violent temper and compared the tools and weapons we seized with the wounds found on the corpse, but have not been able to establish who was responsible for the mutilation. I take full responsibility for this failure."

traits.locale_text: “我们审讯了所有有暴力倾向的囚犯，还将我们缴获的武器与工具与尸体的伤口进行了比对，但我们未能查明究竟是谁残害了那具尸体。我对这样的失败负有全部责任。”

languages.text: "Şiddete eğilimli olduğu bilinen tüm tutsakları detaylı olarak sorguya çektik. Ele geçirdiğimiz aletlerle silahları da cesetteki yara izleriyle karşılaştırdık. Ancak yaralamadan kimin sorumlu olduğunu tespit etmeyi başaramadık. Bu hatanın tüm sorumluluğunu üstleniyorum."
languages.original_text: "We have thoroughly questioned all detainees known to have a violent temper and compared the tools and weapons we seized with the wounds found on the corpse, but have not been able to establish who was responsible for the mutilation. I take full responsibility for this failure."
